To suggest an article, please write an [email](mailto:epidemiology_journal_club@pm.me?subject=Suggestion).

<br>

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(DT)
```

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Data -------------------------------------------------------------------------
author = c("test et al.") # add authors

year = c(2020) # add year of publication

title = c("test test test") # add title of publication

journal = c("test test test") # add journal

discussed = as.Date(c("2022-02-21")) # add date article was discussed

# Create data frame
dat = data.frame(author, year, title, journal, discussed)

# Create table -----------------------------------------------------------------
DT::datatable(
  dat,
  colnames=c("Author", 
             "Year",
             "Title",
             "Journal",
             "Discussed on:"),
  rownames = FALSE,
  fillContainer = FALSE,
  options = list(pageLength = 10)
)
```
